text: Kendra Leigh Wilkinson (formerly Baskett; born June 12, 1985) is an American television personality and model. She is known for being one of Hugh Hefner's girlfriends and for her role on the E! reality television series The Girls Next Door. She was not a Playboy Playmate but she has been in Playboywith her Girls Next Door co-stars Holly Madison and Bridget Marquardt. Her first reality series, Kendra, debuted in June 2009. It ended in November 2011. It was followed by Kendra on Top which ran on WE tv until 2017. ==References== Category:Actors from San Diego Category:American television actors Category:Models from San Diego Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from California Category:Participants in American reality television series
title: Kendra Wilkinson
